sentences.sContent: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.sCn: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.sContent: The area has stunning scenery, beautiful beaches, and much more besides.
sentences.sCn: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

exam.question: The older New England villages have changed relatively little ________ a gas station or two in recent decades.

answer.explain: except for：  除…之外， 其前后两者是性质不一样的事物。 句意：  除新建了一两个加油站外， 新英格兰地区的古老村庄近几十年几乎没有什么变化。 except：  除…之外， 表示例外、  排除， 但前后两者是性质一样的事物， 或者说两者是同属一个整体的； in addition to：  加之， 又， 并且； besides：  除…之外(还有)。

sentences.sContent: ...besides larger places like France and Germany...
...People were tired of using the iPad textbook besides using it for reading...
...a growing body of research has shown that our appetite and food intake are influenced by a large number of factors besides our biological need for energy...
...people have been fascinated with the idea of life existing somewhere else besides earth...
